ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Guise
ygData.msgSnippet: I still don t understand how you have so many problems with Pickup groups? On Saryrn we never have those problems.  Even on Veeshan I never had a problem.
ygData.messageBody:
I still don't understand how you have so many problems with Pickup groups?
On Saryrn we never have those problems. Even on Veeshan I never had a
problem. Pickup groups were nearly as good as some of our guild groups,
some were worse but none were as bad as some of the things you've related on
this board ;)

IMO Pickup groups are awesome because you get to learn new tactics to go
with other people who you aren't used to grouping with. Maybe I just adapt
on the fly better. Maybe you just have some really lousy players on your
server ;) Dunno. I've never had a problem with a pickup group.

Biggest Key in a pickup group: Talk about who's going to do what before you
head anywhere in the dungeon. Don't wait till AFTER you start breaking the
room to discuss who does what.

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath


----- Original Message -----
From: "Cyr, Thierry" <thierry.cyr@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 08, 2000 3:03 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Guise


> well let me explain myself then, i was assuming he was going to guk alone
> considering he had invis potions, i myself hate pickup groups (remember
the
> threads named Group from hell? well i've had 2 in a row). So unless you
get
> to guk with a group, hope there's someone in the tower allready so ya can
> join up with them, or ya might end up like me last night, with a warrior
> getting to the bridge, yelling uh oh and training all the wizards and the
> gibs to the BR. needless to say i didnt make it to the zone. So ya i hope
> for him that unless he has a group allready, that the ass is camped or
he'll
> never get it alone.
>
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, August 08, 2000 2:59 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Guise
>
>
> At 02:21 PM 8/8/00 -0400, you wrote:
> >sure he can form a group, but most chances are the place is camped,
> >secondly, if he just wants to go in and out, if its camped means he can
be
> >there for only a couple spawns as most often the masks rot away.
>
> the room may be camped most of the time, i just disagreed immensely with
> the part i quoted, i.e. ''first, hope that the ass/supp is camped''.
